thread.title: Conference Call Notice: Intertape Polymer Group Inc. First Quarter 2018 Results

author: cnbc.com
title: Conference Call Notice: Intertape Polymer Group Inc. First Quarter 2018 Results
text:
MONTREAL and SARASOTA, Fla., April 26, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Intertape Polymer Group Inc. (TSX:ITP)
DATE: Thursday, May 10, 2018 TIME: 10:00 A.M. (Eastern Time) DIAL-IN #: 877-291-4570 (USA & Canada) DIAL-IN# 647-788-4919 (International)
CONFERENCE CALL WILL BE SIMULTANEOUSLY BROADCAST ON OUR WEBSITE:
www.itape.com
(Go to “Investor Relations”, “Events and Presentations”, “Conference Call Notice” and click on “Marketwired” icon for live Web Cast)
AN ACCOMPANYING PRESENTATION WILL ALSO BE AVAILABLE. DETAILS FOR ACCESS WILL BE INCLUDED IN THE FIRST QUARTER PRESS RELEASE.
DIGITIZED REPLAY
DIAL-IN #: 800-585-8367 (USA & Canada) DIAL-IN #: 416-621-4642 (International) ACCESS CODE: 6864098 SCHEDULE: May 10 @ 1h00 p.m. ending June 10 @ 11:59 p.m. E.T. FIRST QUARTER RESULTS WILL BE PUBLISHED BEFORE MARKET OPENS, MAY 10, THROUGH GLOBENEWSWIRE.
For further information, please contact:
Pierre Boucher
MaisonBrison
514-731-0000
Source: Intertape Polymer Group Inc.
